isis.stitle: 13 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTLO-14613 - INSTALL - MAIN DRIVE GEAR ASSEMBLY

step1.para: Install the snap ring in the I.D. of the main drive gear ( Figure 239).

figure.caption: Figure 239. Install Snap Ring in I.D. of Main Drive Gear

step1.para: Mark the main drive gear for timing purposes. Mark any two adjacent teeth on the drive gear and repeat the procedure for the two adjacent teeth directly opposite the first set marked ( Figure 240). A highly visible color of toolmaker's dye is recommended for making timing marks.

figure.caption: Figure 240. Mark Main Drive Gear For Timing Purposes

step1.para: Mesh the marked tooth of the left countershaft drive gear with two marked teeth on the main drive gear ( Figure 241). Slide the input shaft through the main drive gear ( inset, Figure 241).

figure.caption: Figure 241. Mesh Marked Teeth of Left Countershaft Drive Gear and Main Drive Gear, and Slide Input Shaft Through Main Drive Gear

step1.para: Install the drive gear spacer ( Figure 242). Install the bearing on the input shaft with the external snap ring to the outside ( inset, Figure 242).

figure.caption: Figure 242. Install Drive Gear Spacer and Install Bearing on Input Shaft

step1.para: Install the drive gear bearing on the input shaft and seat the bearing into the case bore with a suitable bearing driver ( Figure 243).

figure.caption: Figure 243. Seat Drive Gear Bearing into Case Bore

step1.para: Temporarily install the front bearing cover ( Figure 244).

figure.caption: Figure 244. Temporarily Install Front Bearing Cover

step1.para: Use a soft bar and maul to drive the input shaft through the bearing ( Figure 245). Remove the front bearing cover.

figure.caption: Figure 245. Drive Input Shaft Through Bearing

step1.para: Install the bearing snap ring ( Figure 246).

Install the front bearing cover and gasket, making sure to align the oil return hole in the case with the hole in the cover ( Figure 247). Secure the front bearing cover on the case with six bolts and tighten to recommended torque ( inset, Figure 247).

figure.caption: Figure 247. Install Front Bearing Cover and Gasket and Secure Front Bearing Cover With Bolts
